## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [deepMerge(target, source)](./blockly.utils.object.deepmerge.md) | Complete a deep merge of all members of a source object with a target object. |
|  [inherits(childCtor, parentCtor)](./blockly.utils.object.inherits.md) | Inherit the prototype methods from one constructor into another. |
|  [mixin(target, source)](./blockly.utils.object.mixin.md) | Copies all the members of a source object to a target object. |
